LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Grizzly.label: Grizzly heavy tank
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Grizzly.description: Heavy combat mechanoids that glide on dozens of tiny legs. Their heavy armor and firepower makes them very effective against bunched-up static defenders. They are somewhat vulnerable to mobile hit-and-run tactics.
LanguageData.ra2_Tank_Grizzly.tools.head.label: head
